00029 using namespace affx;
00030 using namespace affxcel;
00031 using namespace std;
00032 
00033 vector<size_t> getDimensionsFromCelFile(const string &fileName)
00034 {
00035     CCELFileData cel;
00036     cel.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00037     if (!cel.ReadHeader()) {
00038         throw BroadException("Error reading header", __FILE__, __LINE__,  fileName.c_str());
00039     }
00040     size_t numCols = cel.GetCols();
00041     size_t numRows = cel.GetRows();
00042     cel.Close();
00043     vector<size_t> dimensions(2);
00044     dimensions[0] = numRows;
00045     dimensions[1] = numCols;
00046     return dimensions;
00047 }
00048 
00049 // Copied from apt-cel-transformer.cpp
00050 bool writeCelFile(affxcel::CCELFileWriter &cel, const string &format) {
00051   bool success = false;
00052   if(format == "text") 
00053     success = cel.WriteTextCel();
00054   else if(format == "xda")
00055     success = cel.WriteXDABCel();
00056   else if(format == "bcel")
00057     success = cel.WriteTranscriptomeBCel();
00058   else if(format == "ccel") 
00059     success = cel.WriteCompactBCel();
00060   else 
00061     throw BroadException("Don't recognize output format type", __FILE__, __LINE__, format.c_str());
00062   return success;
00063 }
00064 
00065 // Read 1-based probe #s from file into probeSet, converting to 0-based
00066 void readProbeSetFromFile(std::vector<uint32_t> *probeSet, const char *probesetFilename)
00067 {
00068     readSingleColumnFile(probeSet, probesetFilename, "probe_id");
00069     // Convert to 0-based
00070     for (size_t i = 0; i < probeSet->size(); ++i) {
00071         --((*probeSet)[i]);
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 void readQuantilesFromFile(std::vector<double> *quantiles, const char *quantilesFilename)
00076 {
00077     readSingleColumnFile(quantiles, quantilesFilename, "intensities");
00078 }
00079 
00080 void readCelFilesFromFile(std::vector<string> *celfiles, const char *celfilesFilename)
00081 {
00082     readSingleColumnFile(celfiles, celfilesFilename, "cel_files");
00083 }
